Hey whats up yall i know it has been a while not that much has changed gotta ? is it ok the like someone  that doesnt like u tha same way i mean i spent my whole life tellin ppl that life is tooo short to like ppl that dont like u cause there is so  many more ppl in the world but i mean i just realized its not that ez  like u just cant turn off your feelins for someone its no a switch that u can turn on and off  and this grl knows i like her but she doesnt like me  and i dont undastand why i know everybody is not gonna like u but like i here about the otha guys shes wit and im like im sooo much betta so who knows i guess im tryin for sumtin  thats not thurr i do that alot lol but i wrote a song about it i think its retarded but i was just wrote it and it goes like this

Intro:

I want you to know

that i love you

that i want u

and that i need you in my life

Verse:

I know you said

That we should just be friends

But how can we be friends

If every time i here your voice

I fall in love with you again

plz explain

Chorus:

What can i do

What can i say

To make u feel the same way

What can i do

What can i say

For you to say i love u too

What can i do

Verse:

I know ive played some games

That hurt  you before

But plz baby just wait

And dont walk out tha door

baby give me one chance

To make it up to you

And ill show you

love like you've never seen before

Chorus(1x)

Hook:

Everytime i try to see my life without u grl

Baby i cant

Cause theres no one in this world that can make me feel

Like you do

Tell me baby what can i say what can i do

For  you to feel tha same and say i love u tooo

Cause i  cant stop thinkin of you

Chorus(1x)

Cause i cant stop think of you

THE END

Hey know its been a while but i here now a lot has changed since tha last time we spoke for one the friends that i thought it was ova wit were cool again and i still love her as a friend shes such a good person and shes realli good with givin advice and then the otha grl that i said was a great friends i almost started to like her again actually i did but like i started talkin to her and everytime i think about makin a move or whateva she starts talkin about her ex bf well not alot but ive like figured out that were just gonna be friends so i gave up but like i still love talkin to her and stuff but just things being for than friends i dont know i doubt it just bein honest but like shes so great like i neva met a person and likes to sing and likes music as much as i do we have a lot in common just not enough i guess but like i said i still want us to be so close as friends but im writin a song about it lets see besides that now i gotta predicament about goin to public skool like for most ppl hands down public skool would be tha choice but like ive been in private skool all my life and when i went there for dr ed they were Crazzii wich i like so it was fun then on the otha hand i dont want no bull crap wit anyone so i dont know plus i didnt tell anyone i wasnt comin back and id miss so many ppl but then also on the otha hand my best friends and the first grl i eva liked in k5 and i still like a lil bit goes there but it might be some drama cause they used to go out doesnt tha soooooo suck ur bestfriend and ur lifetime crush go out oh well welllli ttyl bye bye

Well i know it has been awhile since weve last spoke u havent really missed anything but me troping a couple of friend gaining a new best friend and gettin a new good friend so i guess u havent missed anything well about the ppl i had to drop they were holding me down and i felt like i didnt need them anymore the gaining a best friend one of my friends which i didnt talkin about alot as opened my eyes and we have become close really really really fast and it werid we talk on the phone alot even though we have bad stadic comunication be ive grown toknow her more and a person and as a friend and i love her dearly and i think she is a gift from God and i guess u see that most of my friend are grls which is cool unless there pmsin or sumtin they get moody lol well now i got a new good friend yall may remeba him a few entries ago but now i guess were good friends im am seriously gonna miss him next year like im not gonna have any guy friends and u know as soon as a person leaves ur skool yall basicly arnt friends which suck and one more thing cause my mom is rusing me my friend that i love dearly is slipping away and its sad bye

Today was on of the worst days of my life i cant believe it my friend that i say i loved well i dont anymore i cant stand her right now all she does it hurt me hurt me well it started a few weeks ago she told me sumtin and i told someone else except they twisted a lil but it wasnt there fault it was mine well she knew i was sry but i guess she felt she needs to stab me in heart well at all day she was pushing me away and at lunch i confronted her about it and she was like we are to close and bull and she starts to like me so we cant be close anymore i was like do u here urself talk were not even close to close i mean seriously thers nothing there she say that we act like bf/gf that bull total bull crap if she was my girlfriend we shed know it trust me  i mean we cant talk on the phone and plus we cant see each other out of skool cause of her parents and ohh she says she doesnt appreciate me talkin about her parents im just keepin it real and tellin the truth cause it needs to be out so i dont care what she think especially right now im just pissed at her soooo much like she doesnt even look at me the same way anymore its like im just anotha aquanties to her and as much as i wanna go leave me alone i neva wanna talk to you again it would hurt me to bad and plus i couldnt do it she can stabb me as many times as she wanted to but im still gonna be there for her nomada what cause thats what a true best friend does and if shes "close" with anyone its tha guy i was tellin u about yestaday she can call him and stuff "hes white of course" but still so im like i dont wanna here tha bull anymore but i know even when she reads this she wont give a care in the world cause thats how she is towards me any otha friend shed be like aww im sry i didnt mean to hurt u but wit me its like ah ha i hope u die oo let me help and gets a knife and stabb me again and agian my otha friend is right there in the same class and i should have listened too her when she asked me how i could be friends the otha grl when we just met i should have realized tht thats sooo true i guess it was friend ship exfacuation oh well its ova now well the exfacuation part anyway  i mean how could u do that to a person pull them close then push them away pull them close then push it away yah know what i think her parents racism has rubbed off on her which is soo sad well maybe its not racism but like tha mind set of i cant be close wit someone thats not white or ppl will start sayin stuff which is totally wrong i am soo glad all ppl arnt like that cause this world would be in trouble a whole lot of trouble well what can u expect if u live in that situation 24/7 im not sayin her hom sit. is bad but not right i guess oh well what can u do but hope that they will change well i guess i said enough about her my otha "donkey" so call friend pissed me off last hour also cause we are doin a project and this grl asked if i had a shirt and tie and he was like he dont got any shirts besidesthat one she wears to skool i was bout to punch him right thurr but i said for your smart butt information i have more than 1 i have alot and dumbbutt Godd i wanted to hurt him hes annoying i dont even know why i call him my friend all he does it annoy me all tha time hes like a roach u step on then but they will neva go away like at skool ill be talkin to my otha friends and then he come right behind me im like dude be gone this is a personal convo thennn...........then my otha gigantic friend i dont know what to say about her like she is selfish she had like 25 meal tickets and i asked could i borrow one cause i left mine at home and she like nooo i was like selfish jerk anyway then when me and my otha friend was in an argue ment she bust all in our conva im like ur not mmindin your own busness again but she still does just to get me ticked i guess u can say all my socalled friends are jerkoffs and i guess they can say stuff about me i dont care we all have of faults theres just seem to be aimed all towards mee if you get confused wit ppl sry i cant use names lol well i guess ill go bye bye oh yeah if u are someone that im talkin about and u wanna print this our be my guest what i said here id say it in your face unlike what some otha ppl can do lata

today was....different i talked to my wasted friend ohhh if i didnt tell you saturday my friend called me talkin bullshittocky on the phone cause she was drunk luckly it was on the answerin machin i was more hurt than mad cause like ppl say the truth comes out when ppl r drunk i guess i know the reel truth oh well so today the i gave the grl thats my world a pic that had our names on it i did it to be nice i kept the fact that i love her in her head well she took it like im her bf and i treat her like shes my gf wich isnt true at all i just love her alot i know there will neva bee anything do i wish it was true that we did go out wellllll i got to admit i would be great but iono it would be to good to be true plus she makes it loud and clear that there will NEVA be anything thurr but its all good ill find someone she still is sooo beautful and i love her but its ok then remember that person the i said i wish i would have been mean to the last 2 years well all things are good wit it were hangin out today we have sooo much in common its werid were like tha freakin same ppl we say tha same stuff at the same time its sooo werid but cool we just .. well ever since my best friend go expelled its nice to talk to ppl who are from the reel world and hes tha only one im gonna miss him nxt year (not that way of course) well back to my world she is kinda pushin me away but ill bring her it suck that her parents are raciest well u be the judge her parents dont want us to be best friends cause im black and ppl might think stuff she we cant see each otha out of skool or talk on the phone it sucks but what can i dooo i guess nothing but like even if i could see her i at least wanna talk to her on the phone its fun and it makes me have but lately it seen that life is full of unhappyness but everything is gonna be alright now sumtin else is goin on it that i might not go to my skool nxt year but most of me wants to stay but a part me want to leave im not scared of public skool but like i dont know how its gonna be all of my white friends that left and went thurr said its cool but for us africas americas we know its diff so iono like i said over and over everything is gonna be alright lets see is there anything else i wanna get out...um.... yah i have anotha friend ive neva seen her and she live 15min away isnt that werid i start to like her alot but then i didnt and then i do shes just a really cooooool person i cant wait till i get my record contract cause like i need to get away if you dont know the real reason i want a contract the truth is that like tha fame will  be cool i guess i just wanna change lives by being diff then what ppl see now plus i wanna help alot of ppl in my life like fam members thats been strugglin foreva i mean u might say yeah right that wont happen when you go money that may be true but imma try so hard to keep my heart in the right place plus i have bunches of ppl that will but me right but ill neva change oh yeah my life also stinks a lil a home well my parents are separated but they still talk its the werid thing eva hopefully everything will work out all i can do is pray well i guess you know everything and more lol well ill talk to you later bye bye
